more_me.title: More About Me
more_me.a: From university when studying mechanical engineering up until now that i am following a path of becoming a python senior developer, i never stopped from learning and i always wanted more and wanted to grow higher.
more_me.b: After starting a new path and completing many freelance projects during last year and passing the tough starting times, i can say that my passion for programming is a true one.
more_me.c: I also spent some time writing trading robots and EA using C and Mql and beside that i enjoy doing 3D designs using blender. as a self-taught developer i can tell that i have no limit in learning new skills.
more_me.d: Loving freelance working i see that it is time for me to go on a more stable career, enjoying my growth with other people and helping others grow too. for me an evolving, intimate environment with meritocratic policies is like a dream coming true.
